name: Mastermind (itch) (Shakochu, Wilfheim, Quirky Kitsune)
description:
This is the page for Mastermind, a game by Michael "Shakochu" Nelson, Alejandro Ballestas, and William Porter.

In this multiplayer game, take on the role of either a Contestant or Mastermind. Contestants try to survive a series of traps and make it to the goal, while the Mastermind has total control over said traps.
